attributes.action: close the borders of the UK to all foreign persons unless they demonstrate useful skills that will be of benefit to the communities in which they hope to reside.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK can no longer continue to support ANY non-UK citizen who wishes to reside in this country unless they are able to demonstrate appropriate skills or trades so as to benefit the communities in which they hope to reside.  Therefore all borders must be closed to all foreign nationals unless their lives are at risk should they return to their home countries.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
